wikipedia_page.main: Jenny Haddon (born 1933 in London, England) is a British writer of over 45 romance novels for Mills & Boon. who writes as Sophie Weston and Sophie Page. She is also a member of the Committee of the U.K.'s Romantic Novelists' Association (R.N.A.), and was elected its twenty-third Chair (2005–2007).

response: * Jenny Haddon (born 1933), English writer of romance novels under the name Sophie West
